body: Hey, i would like to work on this issue. First of all i like to understand the context. Thanks for an answer

@ralphlaude That would be great. See https://doc.akka.io/docs/akka/current/cluster-sharding.html?language=scala#inspecting-cluster-sharding-state for info about the corresponding queries (messages) in untyped Sharding. Corresponding should be exposed as typed ActorRef in the typed ClusterSharding.
@patriknw thanks for the hints. I will read the doc and do it the issue.

@patriknw i have red the doc but i still don't understand the context very well. I look in the classes ```akka.cluster.sharding.ClusterSharding```, ```akka.cluster.sharding.Shard```, ```akka.cluster.sharding.Shard.SharQuery```and ```akka.cluster.sharding.ShardCoordinator```.  Please i need more explanation. thanks
@johanandren can you assist here, next week

issue.title: Typed sharding: Allow queying of local shard region

labels.name: tested
labels.description: PR that was successfully built and tested by Jenkins

repository.name: akka-core
repository.description: A platform to build and run apps that are elastic, agile, and resilient. SDK, libraries, and hosted environments.

issue.body:
Partially addresses #24466 still need to query
all shard regions

body:
Hi @ralphlaude if you still want to work on this i've started it in PR https://github.com/akka/akka/pull/25409 to give you an idea of how to do it. 

For Typed Cluster we add new APIs via exposing a Typed Actor user code can interact with. I've done one query and the other to do is `GetClusterShardingStats`.

If you work on this before my PR is merged you can branch of that to get going. 

Any questions let me know.

Hi @chbatey,
yes, i still want to work on this issue.

Thanks for your PR, now i have an idea of what should be done. I will get into this with the only query ```GetClusterShardingStats```.

I don't understand very well the point concerning the merging of your PR. But i will wait until your PR is merged and the start from there. Is that ok?
